sip_features.sip_feature:
HTML

RTL Updates:

HSDs:
1. 1406445290: "Make the ISM design more robust to unanticipated glitches on pok (cg_en should assert on IDLE exits initiated by either fabric or agent sides)"
2. 1406484777: "Improve the crossbar arbiter efficiency on eom"
3. 1406433875: "FWD (PCR) CG_en parameterized Delay"
4. 1204688456: "FWD (PCR) Add Synchronous Egress queue option to SBR"
5. 220866340: "The stepdown line in VISA sigfile is hardcoded, and sets the STEPDOWN_FACTOR to 2, regardless of the setting of the cspec parameter"
6. 1504600810: "FWD [TGPLP] (Running new Lintra on old release) [SBR] PICr19 - Lintra rule 68012 - source/rtl/iosfsbc/common/iosfsbr_chs_sbcfifo.sv - Signal name 'fifo' cannot be the same as unit/module name 'fifo"
7. 1406480088: "Review the SGDFT ip_info waivers for SBR (remove waivers that are no longer needed)"
8. 220637335: "FWD TGL clock gating enhancement - IOSF sbcegress - explicitly clock gate (or use an enable) for staging of npcredits, pccredits, to save dynamic power"
9. 1405328883: "TFM: SBR Simbuild EFFM"
10. 1405328869: "TFM: SBR EFFM with UPF support"
11. 1406540658: "FWD (PCR) [TFM 1713] Upgrade to TSA 1713.17ww38c containing post-si CDC bug fix"
12. 1406210059: "Dynamo requires to put PIDs for MI unused port in LTE cfg"
13. 1406544692: "Complete VAL work for HSD 1406210059 (FWD Dynamo requires to put PIDs for MI unused port in LTE cfg)"
14. 1406543049: "SBR CDC update"
15. 1406607549: "Expose both the agent and fabric interfaces in collage, when ism is strappable"

Backend Updates:

General Updates:

Validation Updates:

General Updates:

sip_speccons.sip_speccon:
HTML

Integration Notes:

NOTE: CTECH_LIB_NAME must point to a valid synthesisable CTECH library when synthesising the IP.

NOTE: CTECH_LIB_NAME must point to a valid synthesisable/behavior CTECH library when simulating the IP.

sip_specins.sip_specin:
HTML

This SBR release uses the "IOSF_SVC_2017WW45" version of SVC in IRR with constraints on hierarchical headers insertion.

For support file an HSD at SIP HSD

The Zircon scores are uploaded to the IPDS dashboard for the SBR IP at Zircon Scores
